title: Pascal's Triangle
course: Discrete Mathematics by Prof Sudarshan Iyengar

transcript.text: Look at these numbers; one, one one, one two  one, one three three one, one four six four one,
one five ten ten five one. What do these numbers  represent? Each line in this triangle represents
the binomial coefficients as you can see. This  is called the Pascal's triangle and this is a
very pretty -- this is a very popular concept  in mathematics. Let us see more of it in detail.
